name: Mr.DomusMundi
description:
Mr. DomusMundi is the prince who decides the fate of the kingdom. You have only two possible solutions, each option leads to certain consequences.
Prince Mundi solves only global issues on the scale of the kingdom.

Game features:
  • Several options for passing the game;
  • The irreversible consequences of the choice force the player to make difficult decisions;
  • A choice with consequences and a game with platformer elements.
  • War or science, progress or a loan at high interest rates, it's up to you to decide what will happen to the kingdom.
